0111011000110011 1101000100001100 0 -> sum: 0100011100111111, cout: 1

1111010110011101 1011111010011100 0 -> sum: 1011010000111001, cout: 1

1101101100101000 0000010110100101 1 -> sum: 1110000011001110, cout: 0
1000011111001001 1100110010101001 0 -> sum: 0101010001110010, cout: 1
